address: Xã Sơn Long, Huyện Sơn Tây, Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi
thought:
**Determining the New Ward for an Old Address**

Okay, so I've got to figure out the new administrative unit (ward) for "Xã Sơn Long, Huyện Sơn Tây, Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi".  My first step is always to break down the old address:  "Xã Sơn Long" is the ward, and "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi" is the province.  The prompt is eliminating districts for the task at hand.

First, I looked at province resolutions, specifically "60-NQ/TW". It confirms that "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi" remains "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi" after any potential mergers or consolidations.  Good, the province name stays constant. That simplifies things a bit.

Next, I delved into the other relevant resolutions, and bingo! Resolution "1677/NQ-UBTVQH15" is crucial. Line 37 directly addresses my ward: "Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Sơn Long, Sơn Tân và Sơn Dung thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Sơn Tây**."  This is exactly what I needed - a direct mapping!  "Xã Sơn Long" is merged into "Xã Sơn Tây" in Quảng Ngãi.

Now, I checked my `new_wards` list to confirm and retrieve details for the new ward.  Sure enough, there's an entry for "Xã Sơn Tây" in "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi": `{"ward_code":"21340","ward_name":"Xã Sơn Tây","province_name":"Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi"}`.  Perfect.

Before finalizing my JSON output, I always do a double-check. I re-scanned the resolutions to make sure I wasn't missing anything, but "1677/NQ-UBTVQH15" is the only relevant resolution. Then, I considered any potential for ambiguity due to the name "Sơn Tây". I needed to consider all other municipalities that may carry the same name. Luckily, the original input contained the province, so I could quickly determine that the match was specific to "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi". My confidence level here is high, because the resolution directly maps the old ward to the new one.

Given the prompt is asking for all possible new candidates, in this case, the response will be a single result.

My final JSON output will reflect this clear mapping, with the citation pointing to resolution "1677/NQ-UBTVQH15", and a "high" confidence level. The details will, of course, align with the "Xã Sơn Tây" entry I found in my `new_wards` list.  Here's the data structure I have in mind: An array with one object containing the mapping. I am ready to render the final response.

citation.header: 1677/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Quảng Ngãi
citation.line: 37. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Sơn Long, Sơn Tân và Sơn Dung thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Sơn Tây**.
